info.title: Cafe Analog CoffeeCard API
info.description: ASP.NET Core WebAPI for Cafe Analog

post.summary: Register data request. An account is required to verify its email before logging in

201.description: Successful account creation. Verification request email sent to provided email

delete.summary: Request the deletion of the user coupled to the provided token

202.description: Successful initiation of account deletion process

get.summary: Returns basic data about the account

put.summary:
Updates the account and returns the updated values.
Only properties which are present in the UpdateUserRequest will be updated

requestBody.description:
Update account information request. All properties are optional as the server only
            updates the values of the properties which are present

post.summary: Check if a given email is in use

requestBody.description: The email that should be checked

patch.summary: Updates the user group of a user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the user whose userGroup will be updated

post.summary: Resend account verification email if account is not already verified

get.summary: Searches a user in the database

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A filter to search by Id, Name or Email. When an empty string is given, all users will be returned

post.summary: Sends a magic link to the user's email to login
Authenticates the user with the token hash from a magic link

requestBody.description: The token hash from the magic link

200.description: A JSON Web Token used to authenticate for other endpoints and a refresh token to re-authenticate without a new magic link

post.summary: Sum unused clip cards within a given period per productId

requestBody.description: Request object containing start and end date of the query

200.description: Products with tickets that match the criteria

get.summary: Gets the top leaderboard by the specified preset

parameters.name: preset
parameters.description: Leaderboard preset for date filtering. See LeaderboardPreset for possible values

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of top results to return

get.summary: Get leaderboard stats for authenticated user. A user will have rank 0 if they do not have any valid swipes

parameters.name: preset
parameters.description: Leaderboard preset for date filtering. See LeaderboardPreset for possible values

get.summary: Returns a list of all menu items

post.summary: Webhook to be invoked by MobilePay backend

requestBody.description: The request containing the details of the product to be added and allowed user groups

get.summary: Returns a list of available products based on a account's user group.

put.summary: Updates a product with the specified changes.

requestBody.description: The request containing the changes to be applied to the product

get.summary: Returns a product with the specified id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the product to be returned

404.description: The product with the specified id could not be found

get.summary: Returns a list of all products

403.description: User not allowed to purchase given product

get.summary: Get all purchases for a user

403.description: User not allowed to view purchases for given user

post.summary: Uses a ticket (for the given product) on the given menu item

requestBody.description: The product id and menu item id to use a ticket for

403.description: User has no tickets for the product or the menu item is not eligible for the ticket

404.description: The product or menu item could not be found

post.summary: Issue voucher codes, that can later be redeemed
Redeems the voucher supplied as parameter in the path

requestBody.description: The request containing the new user groups

MessageResponseDto.description: Simple response class with a string message

password.description: Pin Code as first UTF8 encoded, then SHA256 hashed, and then Base64 encoded string

UpdateUserRequest.description: Update User information request object. All properties are optional as the server only updates the values of the properties which are present

password.description: Pin Code as first UTF8 encoded, then SHA256 hashed, and then Base64 encoded string

EmailExistsResponse.description: Contains information about an email being in use

emailExists.description: Contains information about an email being in use

EmailExistsRequest.description: An email that should be checked if it already exists

UpdateUserGroupRequest.description: Update the UserGroup property of a user

UserGroup.description: Represents the different groups that a user can belong to.

totalUsers.description: The number of users that match the query

users.description: The users that match the query

UserState.description: Represents the state of a User.

loginType.description: Defines which application should open on login

LoginType.description: Enum for applications to log in to

jwt.description: JSON Web Token with claims for the user logging in

refreshToken.description: Token used to obtain a new JWT token on expiration

UnusedClipsResponse.description: Initialize a response with unused clips data

ticketsLeft.description: The number of tickets unused in a purchase

unusedPurchasesValue.description: The value of the unused purchases of a given product

UnusedClipsRequest.description: Initialize a request for data with unused clips.

startDate.description: The start date of unused tickets query.

endDate.description: The end date of unused tickets query.

environmentType.description: Environment type for indicating production or test system

LeaderboardPreset.description: Preset for filtering Leaderboard based on date range

MenuItemResponse.description: Represents a menu item that can be redeemed with a ticket

active.description: Whether or not this menu item is active

AddMenuItemRequest.description: Initiate a new menuitem add request.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the product.
Gets or sets the updated name of the product.

active.description: Gets or sets the updated active status of the product.

MobilePayWebhook.description:
MobilePay webhook invocation request 
Code documentation based on MobilePay Developer: Webhooks

notificationId.description: Internal MobilePay Id for Webhook invocation

eventType.description:
Type of event

    
        payment.reserved
        Published when payment has been approved by MobilePay user and is ready to be captured
    
    
        payment.cancelled_by_user
        Published when payment has been cancelled by user inside MobilePay app
    
    
        payment.expired
        Published when either initiated payment didn't have any user interactions for 5-10 minutes or payment was reserved, but 7 days have passed and the reservation has expired.

type.description: Internal MobilePay representation of a type.

isPerk.description: Eligible due to a user perk privilege

allowedUserGroups.description: Decides the user groups that can access the product.

eligibleMenuItems.description: The menu items that this product can be used on.

AddProductRequest.description: Initiate a new product add request.

price.description: Gets or sets the price of the product.

numberOfTickets.description: Gets or sets the number of tickets associated with the product.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the product.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the product.
description.example: A homemade latte with soy milk

visible.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the product. Default is true.

allowedUserGroups.description: Gets or sets the user groups that can access the product.

menuItemIds.description: Gets or sets the menu items that are eligible for the product.

price.description: Gets or sets the updated price of the product.

numberOfTickets.description: Gets or sets the updated number of tickets associated with the product.

name.description: Gets or sets the updated name of the product.

description.description: Gets or sets the updated description of the product.
description.example: A homemade espresso from fresh beans

visible.description: Gets or sets the updated visibility of the product. Default is true.

allowedUserGroups.description: Gets or sets the user groups that can access the product.

menuItemIds.description: Gets or sets the eligible menu items for the product.

dateCreated.description: Date time for purchase in Utc format

numberOfTickets.description: Number of tickets issued in purchase

totalAmount.description: Total purchase price in Danish Kroner (kr)

dateCreated.description: Date time for purchase in Utc format

totalAmount.description: Total purchase price in Danish Kroner (kr)

paymentDetails.description: Details about the payment. The details object is specific to the Payment Type

PaymentType.description: PaymentType represents the type of Payment which is used to fulfill a purchase

mobilePayAppRedirectUri.description: App deeplink for a MobilePay payment

allOf.description: Payment details for a free purchase

InitiatePurchaseResponse.description: Response object to a purchase request containing purchase information and reference to payment provider

dateCreated.description: Date time for purchase in Utc format

productId.description: Id of the product to be purchased

productName.description: Name of the product to be purchased

totalAmount.description:
The amount of money to be collected by the purchase.
A positive integer representing how much to charge in the smallest currency unit (e.g., 100 rer to charge 1.00 Danish kroner).

paymentDetails.description: Details about the payment. The details object is specific to the Payment Type

productId.description: Id of product to be purchased

paymentType.description: Payment Type used to fulfill purchase

TicketResponse.description: Representing a ticket for a product

dateCreated.description: Issuing date time for ticket in Utc format

dateUsed.description: Used date time for ticket in Utc format

productId.description: The Id of product a ticket is for

productName.description: Name of product a ticket is for

usedOnMenuItemName.description: The name of the menu item that this ticket was used on

UsedTicketResponse.description: Representing a used ticket for a product

dateCreated.description: Issuing date time for ticket in Utc format

dateUsed.description: Used date time for ticket in Utc format

productName.description: Name of product a ticket is for

menuItemName.description: Name of the menu item that this ticket was used on

UseTicketRequest.description: Represents a request to use a ticket.

productId.description: The id of the product the ticket is for.

menuItemId.description: The id of the menu item to use the ticket on.

IssueVoucherResponse.description: Response object for creating voucher codes

voucherCode.description: Voucher code to be redeemed in the app

productId.description: The id of the product the voucher code is for

productName.description: The name of the product the voucher code is for

issuedAt.description: The date the voucher code was created

IssueVoucherRequest.description: Request object for creating voucher codes

productId.description: Id of the product to create voucher codes for

amount.description: The amount of vouchers to be issued

voucherPrefix.description: A 3 character long user defined prefix for every voucher code

description.description: Description of the purpose for the creation of vouchers

requester.description: The requester of the voucher codes

WebhookUpdateUserGroupRequest.description: Represents a request to update user groups in bulk

privilegedUsers.description: List of accounts and their new user groups

AccountUserGroup.description: Represents an account user group update

apikey.description: Api Key used for health endpoints
apikey.name: x-api-key
